WorkGoalShare.name: WorkGoalShare
WorkGoalShare.description: Represents a sharing entry on a WorkGoal object.

AccessLevel.description: The user’s or group’s level of access to the goal. The possible values are: Read Edit All: This value is not valid when you create, update, or delete records This field must be set to an access level that is higher than the organization’s default access level for goals.

ParentId.description: ID of the WorkGoal object that is associated with this sharing entry.

RowCause.description: Reason that this sharing entry exists. If you’re creating a sharing entry, the only permitted value is Manual. If no value is specified, the field defaults to Manual. All other RowCause values are read-only. After the sharing entry is created, this field can’t be edited.

UserOrGroupId.description: ID of the user or group that was given access to the goal. This field can’t be updated.
